sentence: Democratic County Recorder Adrian Fontes led Republican challenger Stephen Richer for four days, falling behind over the weekend after the election, one of several countywide Democratic candidates who saw their leads evaporate in the days after the election.
author: Jeremy Duda
title: GOP ballot measure in Arizona would restrict early voting to speed up ballot counting

sentence: On the Democratic side, Reginald Bolding raised $160,000, edging out the $139,000 that former Maricopa County Recorder Adrian Fontes raised.
author: Dillon Rosenblatt
title: The haves & have nots become clear in Arizona governor, secretary of state races
